alert.note: Alert for Smyth (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 9:23PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Smyth County through 945 PM EDT... At 919 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Adwolf, or near Chilhowie, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 30 mph. Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Water may pond on roadways causing traffic to slow. Locations impacted include... Marion...Chilhowie... Sugar Grove... Adwolf... Interstate 81 near Marion. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers...especially those along Interstate 81, are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
